analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#385-399):

	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#393-396)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#399)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.invest (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#328-367):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#334-335)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#352-355)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#351-352)

SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#579-581) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#294-295)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#308-311)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.invest (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#328-367):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#334-335)

	- investedAmountOf (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#342-346)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#452-482) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#465-482)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#459-482)

FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#198)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#647-648)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0xca53e73938b5a3c484331b50d9f67aa7c878ac76.sol#39-41:
